name: django template textobjects
summary: textobject mappings for the django template language
description:
Repo: http://github.com/mjbrownie/django-template-textobjects

Example vid (includes other plugins): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NbV-OrFMalU

" Dependencies:
"
"     textobj-user by Kana Natsuno
"     http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2100
"
"
"
" Overview:
"     This plugin adds some textobjects to the html.django_template filetype
"
"     idb/adb - in/around a django {% block %}
"     idf/adf - in around a django {% for %} loop
"     idi/adi - in/around a django {% if* } tag
"     idw/adw - in around a django {% with %} tag 
"
"    so use as you would other text objects in visual selection, cutting and
"    deleting etc. 
"
"    Eg. vidb,... vidi ... dadf ... gUidw ... possiblities are as endless as they are awesome

Note there's a complimentary html textobject script as well 

http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=3000
install_details:
"   Please ensure you have the above plugins installed as instructed
"   This file should be in your after/ftplugin for django_template
"
"   ~/.vim/after/ftplugin/django_template/template_textobjects.vim
"  make sure your filetype=html.django_template.

This is set by other plugins like snipmate

versions.release_notes: Fixed a bufnr bug affecting around mappings
Improved nesting logic. Removed matchit dependancy
Fix for inner block visual grabbing }{ . no match handling
